_header: Most merciful Lord by thine abundant goodness
_description: The Story of Job — twenty-six stanzas rhyme royal

HunHM140.First Lines:
Most mercifull lorde by thyne habundant goodnesseThis rightful man
                    Iob With grete hospitalite…
HunHM140.Last Lines:
…Hym to convey with patriarkes and prophetes allOnto the
                    perpetuall Ioy and glory eternall
HunHM140.Editions:
MacCracken,  Henry Noble. 
             “Lydgatiana: 1. The Life of Holy Job.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         126 (1911): 365-70: 366-70.
Garmonsway,  G. N.,  and  R. M. Raymo.  
             “A Middle English Metrical Life of Job.” 
             Early English and Norse Studies Presented to Hugh Smith.
         London: Methuen, 1963: 77-98: 89-96.
